overview: Despite the many curious similarities between Susan Hayward and Lena Horne-both were born in Brooklyn on exactly the same day, for example-one detail set their careers on very different paths. This doc examines their parallel lives.
tagline: Lena Horne's 'Stormy Weather' (1943) and Susan Hayward's 'With a Song in My Heart' (1952) blend together in a video essay.
title: Storm in My Heart
